titles.title: A resolution congratulating and expressing gratitude to Commander Jeremy Robertson and the crew of the USS Carney for the exemplary and historic performance during their 235-day deployment to the United States Naval Forces Europe-Africa and the United States Naval Forces Central Command.

A resolution congratulating and expressing gratitude to Commander Jeremy Robertson and the crew of the USS Carney for the exemplary and historic performance during their 235-day deployment to the United States Naval Forces Europe-Africa and the United States Naval Forces Central Command.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: This resolution congratulates the crew of the USS Carney for its successful completion of a historic deployment and expresses gratitude to the crew members. Further, the resolution commends the leadership and tactical expertise demonstrated by the commanding officers and crew members during their deployment.
